challenges.title: Reverse a String
challenges.description: Write a function that takes a string as input and returns the reversed string. For example, if the input is 'hello', the output should be 'olleh'.

challenges.title: Calculate Factorial
challenges.description: Write a function that calculates the factorial of a number. The factorial of n (denoted as n!) is the product of all positive integers less than or equal to n. For example, 5! = 5 × 4 × 3 × 2 × 1 = 120.

challenges.title: Fibonacci Sequence
challenges.description: Write a function that returns the nth number in the Fibonacci sequence. The Fibonacci sequence starts with 0 and 1, and each subsequent number is the sum of the two preceding ones: 0, 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13, 21, ...

challenges.title: Check Palindrome
challenges.description: Write a function that checks if a given string is a palindrome. A palindrome is a word, phrase, number, or other sequence of characters that reads the same forward and backward (ignoring spaces, punctuation, and capitalization).

test_cases.input: A man a plan a canal Panama

challenges.title: FizzBuzz Printer
challenges.description: Given an integer N, print numbers from 1..N replacing multiples of 3 with "Fizz", multiples of 5 with "Buzz", and multiples of both with "FizzBuzz".

test_cases.output: 1 2 Fizz 4 Buzz Fizz 7 8 Fizz Buzz 11 Fizz 13 14 FizzBuzz

challenges.title: Mini REST API
challenges.description: Build an Express.js server with a single /tasks endpoint supporting GET and POST with in-memory storage.

challenges.title: Test a React Counter
challenges.description: Write a React Testing Library test that renders a Counter component, clicks increment twice, and asserts the value.

challenges.title: Memory Snapshot
challenges.description: Allocate a dynamic buffer, write bytes, and print their hexadecimal representation using pointer arithmetic.
